result.markdown: --- title: "Week 7: ETS models (part 2)" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Exponential smoothing with seasonality * Automatic model selection using the AICc ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 8.3-8.4 and 8.6-8.7 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 7, 10-15 from [Section 8.8 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth-exercises.html). ## Monday lecture Download slides ## Assignments * [Assignment 2](../assignments/A2.qmd) is due on Friday 25 April. ## Weekly quiz * [Week 7 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868372) is due on Sunday 20 April.
